generatedTitle: The Legacy and Success of Field Hockey in India

extractFactDictList.question: What is the most popular sport in India?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Hockey is one of the most popular sports in India, and the country has a rich history of success in the sport.

extractFactDictList.question: How many Olympic gold medals has India won in hockey?
extractFactDictList.sentence: India has won eight Olympic gold medals in hockey, which is the most by any team in the history of the Olympics.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the last time India won a gold medal in hockey at the Olympics?
extractFactDictList.sentence: However, the last time India won a gold medal in hockey at the Olympics was in 1984, when the team won the gold medal at the Los Angeles Olympics.

extractFactDictList.question: In which years did India win silver medals in hockey at the Olympics?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Since then, India has won silver medals in 1988, 1992, 1996, and 2004, but has not been able to win a gold medal.

extractFactDictList.question: Is India still competitive in international hockey?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Despite this, India remains one of the top teams in the world and continues to compete at the highest level of international hockey.
